title: Volcom Totally Crustaceous Tour 15/16 EUROPE RECAP
description:
2016 Volcom Totally Crustaceous Tour Global Championships will be held at Lower Trestles from June 14-17, with a live webcast on the final two days! 

The event will gather 250 invited qualifiers from around the world: Brazil, Australia, Latin America, Japan, New Zealand, Europe, USA, Indonesia, South Africa, and Puerto Rico!
Huge congrats to the European surfers that won their trip to compete at the global TCT Champs next week!

In Pro/Am division (20 and under): Miguel Blanco, Francisco Duarte and Frederico Magalhães, all from Portugal.
In Juniors (16 and under): Luis Diaz (Canary Islands) and João Moreira (Portugal)
In Girls (20 and under): Ariane Ochoa (Euskadi) and Melania Suárez (Canary Islands)
In Groms (13 and under): Afonso Antunes and Guilherme Ribeiro, both from Portugal
In Squids (10 years and under) : João Mendonça (Portugal)

Here is a little recap clip of this season’s European TCT competitions.

The tour consisted of two Rumblefish surf series (Amado and Caparica, Portugal), the Lavafish surf series (Tenerife island) and the Mulletfish surf series (Hossegor, France).

Full list of TCT Global Championships confirmed competitors, event schedule, and heat draw will be available soon
June 14th-17th, 2016
Lower Trestles, CA
$30,000 Prize Purse

Two Day Live Webcast (June 16 & 17)
